text: Bekim Halilaj is the majority shareholder and president of Albanian football club Luftëtari. ==Early life== Halilaj was convicted of fraud in Albania in 1996 and was sentenced to five years in prison, but he did not serve any prison time as he moved to Greece shortly after the conviction. He settled in Thessaloniki where he lived for over a decade before his sentence was pardoned and he was able to return to Albania. ==References== ==External links== Category:Living people Category:20th-century Albanian people Category:21st- century Albanian people Category:Albanian businesspeople Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Bekim Halilaj
